meanings.definition: The quality of being farfetched or improbable.
meanings.sent1: The farfetchednesses of the story made it hard to believe.
meanings.sent2: The farfetchednesses of his excuse raised suspicions.
meanings.sent3: The farfetchednesses of the situation was so extreme, it seemed like a joke.
meanings.sent4: The farfetchednesses of her dreams reached new heights.
meanings.sent5: The farfetchednesses of the conspiracy theory was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of being farfetched or unlikely.
meanings.sent1: The movie's farfetchednesses left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the farfetchednesses of the plan.
meanings.sent3: The farfetchednesses of the proposal made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His farfetchednesses in finding a solution amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The farfetchednesses of the theory lingered in their minds.
